QueryResult.text: SELECT dm.object, CASE WHEN INSTR(dm.object, '~') <> 0 THEN TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(dm.object, INSTR(dm.object, '~')+1)) ELSE 0 END roadmap_key, dm.attribute, dm.type, dm.default_type_code map_value, NULL lower_limit, NULL upper_limit, NULL value FROM odf_display_mappings dm WHERE dm.object like 'rdm_roadmap_item%' UNION ALL SELECT dm.object, CASE WHEN INSTR(dm.object, '~') <> 0 THEN TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(dm.object, INSTR(dm.object, '~')+1)) ELSE 0 END roadmap_key, dm.attribute, dm.type, m.type_code map_value, m.lo lower_limit, m.hi upper_limit, m.value FROM odf_display_mappings dm INNER JOIN odf_mappings m ON dm.id = m.display_mappings_id WHERE dm.object like 'rdm_roadmap_item%'
